body:
On Feb 20, 2008, at 6:52 PM, Mark Stock wrote:


> I thought X11 started on its own (I have OSX 10.5.2). I don't know  
> what the problem might be, then.


That's new in 10.5.x.  If he's got an older version of Mac OS he has  
to start it like any other app.


Randolph
